sentences.en: ...so they can feel less guilty about their piles of filthy lucre.
sentences.cn: ...这样他们就可以对那大把大把的黑心钱感到不那么内疚了。

sentences.en: He got rich quickly by acquiring filthy lucre.
sentences.cn: 他是靠不义之财暴发的.

sentences.en: He was blinded by the lust of lucre.
He would sell his soul for filthy lucre.
sentences.cn: 他为了不义之财而出卖灵魂.

sentences.en: I don't want to lose my health for the sake of filthy lucre.
sentences.cn: 我不想为了几个臭钱而损伤身体.

sentences.en: I'm going to write a book for the lucre of gain.
Perhaps because Mumbai stands for lucre, profane dreams and an indiscriminate openness.
sentences.cn: 也许是因为孟买主张财富 、 世俗的梦想和对外一视同仁的开放.

sentences.en: You cannot bribe me; I do not want you filthy lucre.
sentences.cn: 你别向我行贿, 我不要你的臭钱.

trans.tran_en: money or wealth – used to show disapproval
